_______________________________________

Are you an international? 
Too many new vocabulary on web pages?
Want to build up vocabulary while having a natural reading experience?

Bearead.io is an innovative tool designed for internationals. When you open any page, it will automatically detect all difficult words in the webpage and automatically translate on top of each word! A lifesaver for internationals living in U.S. or other English speaking country.

Works on almost all webpages, including but far not limited to:
- News Websites
- Email providers
- ChatGPT
- Youtube Subtitles

Currently supports only Chinese translation.
